body:
Hi @hyangah,
thank you for the hint, problem solved.
It was in GOPATH, I have it defined in build.gradle with multiple paths, and used ';' as hardcoded separator. This is a reason why it worked on Windows, but failed on CentOS.
Replacing separator on File.pathSeparator solved all issues, now it works on both platforms.

@star-tek-mb, thank you for your patience.
